name: BrainWorkout
0:
”Alexa, start Brain Workout”
”Alexa, launch Brain Workout”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: brain workout
des:
It’s time to play smarter and feel sharper with Brain Workout, the most popular brain training skill designed to improve your focus, concentration, memory, processing speed, math skills, and more. 
A stronger brain leads to a better life and our brain games have been designed by drawing from research in memory studies. Each workout is fun, interactive, and personalized with exercises that adjust over time to maximize results 
The more you train with Brain Workout, the more you’ll improve critical cognitive skills that are proven to boost productivity and self-confidence. 
Users who train at least 3 times per week have reported dramatic gains and increased confidence.

Features:
• 6 questions per session for critical cognitive skills like concentration, focus, memory, processing speed, and math
• Performance tracking
• Personalized daily workouts based on past performance
• Adaptive difficulty progression to ensure your experience is challenging

Join tens of thousands of brain trainers worldwide now and see what this brain teaser skill is all about

Please go to our Facebook page (fb.me/MyBrainWorkout) or contact us on messenger (m.me/MyBrainWorkout.) for any feedback or questions.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
